Advice to communicants for necessary preparation and profitable improvement of the great and comfortable ordinance of the Lords Supper that therein true spiritual communion with Christ may be obtained, and the eternal enjoyment of God sealed / by Robert Craghead ... Craghead, Robert.
[18], 148 p.
Printed for William Dickie,book-seller in Glasgow, and are to be sold at his shop ..., Edinburgh : 1695.
Page 145 misprinted 245. Reproduction of original in the British Library.
